name: Earthinator
description:
The Kragors one of the oldest civilizations on the galaxy began to suffer the problems of overpopulation in their planets, so they had to start one of their most ambitious projects, repair the destroyed planets in order to colonize them, for this they use their new technology, a macro machine that collects the resources that roam the emptiness of space and using them to repair the worlds until they are habitable for the Kragors.

That machine is... Earthinator

#GGJ
